column4: U.S. safety board probes fatal Tesla accident in Florida
column5: The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board said on Wednesday it will investigate a Tesla accident in Fort Lauderdale  Florida this week that killed two teenagers and injured another - the agency's fourth active probe into crashes of the company's electric vehicles.

column4: UPDATE 3-U.S. safety board probes fatal Tesla accident in Florida
column5: May 9 The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board said on Wednesday it will investigate a Tesla accident in Fort Lauderdale  Florida this week that killed two teenagers and injured another - the agency's fourth active probe into crashes of the company's electric vehicles.

column4: BRIEF-CTW Investment Urges Tesla Shareholders To Vote Against Re-Election Of Directors Antonio Gracias  Kimball Musk  And James Murdoch
column5: * CTW INVESTMENT GROUP URGES TESLA INC SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE AGAINST RE-ELECTION OF DIRECTORS ANTONIO GRACIAS  KIMBALL MUSK  AND JAMES R. MURDOCH Source text: (https://bit.ly/2I8cgcH) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

column4: Qualcomm sets new $10 billion buyback plan
column5: Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  said on Wednesday its board has  approved a new $10 billion buyback program that replaces the previous $15 billion stock repurchase program announced in March 2015.

column4: Qualcomm sets new $10 bln buyback plan
column5: May 9 Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc said on Wednesday its board has  approved a new $10 billion buyback program that replaces the previous $15 billion stock repurchase program announced in March 2015.

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm Announces New $10 Bln Stock Repurchase Authorization
